title: Miguel Interview and More
itunes:title: Miguel Interview and More
description:
Thursday 5/17 - Today on the show we had Miguel stop and you know Charlamagne was excited for this one. He discussed his new music, getting more connected with his spanish root and more. Also, Charlamagne gave "Donkey of the Day" to attorney Aaron Schlossberg who threatened to call ICE on Spanish-speaking workers at Midtown Fresh Kitchen and Angela gave some advice to some listeners during "Ask Yee". 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
Thursday 5/17 - Today on the show we had Miguel stop and you know Charlamagne was excited for this one. He discussed his new music, getting more connected with his spanish root and more. Also, Charlamagne gave "Donkey of the Day" to attorney Aaron Schlossberg who threatened to call ICE on Spanish-speaking workers at Midtown Fresh Kitchen and Angela gave some advice to some listeners during "Ask Yee". 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
